original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3351)@</color>使用雙武器輪替對前方施展8波刺擊，每次以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3351)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3351)@</color> Use dual weapons to alternately cast 8 waves of stabs to the front, each time with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3351)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
